attributes.action: make people on benefits wear clogs when out of the house.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it would be great if those on benefits were made to wear clogs when outside their own property. it would help with reducing the number of people that claim benefit as clogs are noisy and uncomfortable. also if any of them try to commit crime, they will be easier to catch as it is quite difficult to run in clogs.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
